GSD.description:
block: stop setting the nomerges flags in blk_cleanup_queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit fdb28e9688154d6127a4ab4a0aef8b7090865f8a. For more details please see the references link.
